name: Register an overseas entity
synonyms: Register an overseas entity and tell us about its beneficial owners
Register and find a beneficial owner
description: Overseas entities who want to buy, sell or transfer property or land in the UK, must register with Companies House and tell them who their registrable beneficial owners or managing officers are.

items.label: Assessed as red at alpha stage

links.text: News story: The new Register of Overseas Entities is live
